mapper.insert: insert eventCreditRules (id, name, credit,goldenMedal,silverMedal,bronzeMedal,eventTypeId,upperRank,lowerRank,stage,eventGroupLevel, createdTime, lastModifiedTime) values (#{id},#{name},#{credit},#{goldenMedal},#{silverMedal},#{bronzeMedal},#{eventTypeId},#{upperRank},#{lowerRank},#{stage},#{eventGroupLevel}, now(),now())
mapper.update: update eventCreditRules set name=#{name}, credit=#{credit}, goldenMedal=#{goldenMedal}, silverMedal=#{silverMedal}, bronzeMedal=#{bronzeMedal}, eventTypeId=#{eventTypeId}, stage=#{stage}, upperRank=#{upperRank}, lowerRank=#{lowerRank}, eventGroupLeve=#{eventGroupLevel} where id = #{id};
